bio.name: Lior Sherbaty
bio.title: .NET developer
bio.description: I'm an expert .NET developer specializing in transforming complex legacy systems into high-performance, reliable applications. At Philips Medical Systems and now at mPrest, I've delivered measurable improvements in performance, scalability, and security across mission-critical projects.I combine deep technical expertise with a pragmatic mindset, bringing clarity to complex challenges and driving clean, maintainable solutions. Whether leading initiatives or collaborating across teams, I aim to keep things efficient, thoughtful and occasionally funny. I believe great code should not only work well, but make life easier for the people who build and use it.

personalInfo.philosophy: Outside the code editor, I'm fueled by humor, family adventures, and the quest for the perfect coffee blend. My home life involves balancing fatherhood, marital teamwork, and placating two highly opinionated cats who occasionally approve my pull requests. My guiding principles - simplicity, efficiency, and clarity, drive my software development style as well as my personal philosophy.
funFacts: Family Status: Married, father of one adventurous son
